AND:     0b0000000000000000000000000000000f & 0b00000000000000000000000000000003 = 0b00000000000000000000000000000000
OR:      0b0000000000000000000000000000000f | 0b00000000000000000000000000000003 = 0b00000000000000000000000000000000
XOR:     0b0000000000000000000000000000000f ^ 0b00000000000000000000000000000003 = 0b00000000000000000000000000000000
NOT:    ~0b0000000000000000000000000000000f          = 0b00000000000000000000000000000000
rotr(8,0b000000f0,1) = 0b00000078
rotl(8,0b000000f0,2) = 0b000000c3
asr (8,0b000000f0,3) = 0b000000fe
